SELECT EMPLOYEE.*, DEPARTMENT.NAME AS departmentName, job.name as jobName FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT ON EMPLOYEE.DEPARTMENTID = DEPARTMENT.ID JOIN JOB ON EMPLOYEE.JOBID = JOB.ID WHERE EMPLOYEE.NAME LIKE #{name}

SELECT e.name, d.name AS departmentName, j.name AS jobName FROM project_user pu JOIN employee e ON pu.employeeId = e.id JOIN department d ON e.departmentId = d.id JOIN job j ON e.jobId = j.id WHERE pu.projectId = #{projectId}
